pr_title: Convert the pxf-api project to a boot project

timeline.message:
Convert the pxf-api project to a boot project

- Provide a top level build.gradle with only pxf-api enabled
- Provide a build.gradle for pxf-api
- Migrate unit tests to JUnit 5
- Make all unit tests pass

replies.bodyText:
We can no longer mock the static KerberosUtil.hasKerberosKeyTab(subject) method. So we need to make KerberosUtil.hasKerberosKeyTab return the expected value. For that, when we want a subject with a Kerberos Keytab, we create a subject like this:

  
    
      pxf/server/pxf-api/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/security/PxfUserGroupInformationTest.java
    
    
         Line 92
      in
      5f3680b
    
    
    
    

        
          
           subjectWithKerberosKeyTab = new Subject(false, Sets.newHashSet(user), Sets.newHashSet(), Sets.newHashSet(mockTGT, mockKeyTab)); 
        
    
  


which has two items in the private credentials as opposed to 1 before
